text: Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“You jing ren a! Nimen lai ba! Zai women he nimen zhi jian dacheng yi zhong gongping xieyi: Women zhi chongbai an la, bu gei ta shezhi renhe pei wu; women renhe ren dou bu she an la er ba ziji ren dang zhuzai [zhu].” Jiaru tamen beili, name, nimen jiu shuo:“Qing nimen zuozheng women shi guishun zhe [musilin].”
